Posts.Content: lalere wrote: I can't seem to find this topic anywhere on this forum.  Can some of you share what you are dealing with in regards to long term effects from chemo?  I finished my chemo rounds 2 months ago and am having the typical fingernail, eyebrow and eyelash loss that others have mentioned.  I was just curious what some of you that are 6 months out/1 year out/2 years out are having to deal with.  Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Long term side effects lalere fluffqueen01

Posts.Content: Apr 7, 2012 09:05AM lalere wrote: For those of you going through radiation now, how long until your skin started breaking down and blistering?  I've completed day 12.  The RO had said it usually starts at week 2.  Just checking with you all.
Posts.Title: Taxotere/Cytoxan - December 2011 LeesaAnn AnnieLane

Posts.Content: Apr 18, 2012 08:25PM lalere wrote: I love water.  During chemo and for several weeks after I couldn't stand water.  I ended up drinking lemonade and sprite to quench my thirst.
Posts.Title: What to drink to quench thirst? JoanQuilts Hortense
